capsule.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a plastic container shaped like a very small tube with medicine inside that you swallow whole
capsule.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a small plastic container with a substance or liquid inside
capsule.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the part of a spacecraft in which people live and work
capsule.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: a space capsule orbiting the Earth
